title: It is good to have land...
body:
I just started playing a lot of mount and blade: warband.... aside from the runescape level of graphics most of the time, it is a really great game. I think my favorite part is how there isn't really a "too big to fail" and you can get caught off guard really easy. Its been a long time since I have enjoyed an RTS this much, and I am super hyped for bannerlords. Also I am in charge of 2 villages and a city who give me money as well as various businesses. Never has possessing land felt so good in a game. Its amazing. 

Just thought I's share. If I ever get around to it I might find a name change mod and interject all you guys into. It and do a story thread with it :^)
